title: Speedy jacket potatoes with crispy bacon and salmon

ingredients.item: 3 essential Waitrose smoked British bacon streaky rashers

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7. Prick the potatoes with a fork, place on a plate and microwave on high (900W)for 3 minutes. Turn them over and microwave for a further 3 minutes. Transfer the potatoes to a baking sheet and brush with the oil. Season and bake in the oven for 20 minutes.  Meanwhile, place the bacon on a separate baking sheet and cook with the potatoes in the oven for 6–8 minutes.  Crumble the bacon and mix into the cottage cheese with the remaining ingredients; season. Once the potatoes are cooked, cut them open, add the topping and serve.
